About Me

Let me tell you a few things..

BIO

If you made it this far thank you for taking the time to learn a little about me. I am a gradute from Cal Poly Pomona with a degress in Application Development. I have more than 3 years working as a fron end developer. From internships to paid projects. I have worked with many teams. Experience in HTML, Javascript frame works that include Angular and React. I have worked with SCSS and CSS. Please feel free to reach out to me if you have any more questions. Also check out some of my many projects
